m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- China’s 21st Century Dilemma: Development and Carbon Emissions October 6th, 2014 by Sandy Dechert   “Damned if you do, damned if you don’t.” That’s the paradox gripping China, the world’s most populous nation. A new seven-year study by researchers from the University of East Anglia relates China’s carbon dioxide emissions to the country’s accelerating economic growth.
